item.description:
PLEASE DO NOT DOUBLE TRIPLE OR QUADRUPLE RSVP


Kitty OSheas is an awesome spot to host another Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party for 200 members on Friday June 13, 2008! This is not a Singles party. So anyone can come that means couples etc are welcome so all can get to know one another and socialize.

Location: Kitty OSheas is in Boston (near Faneuil Hall) 131 State St Boston, MA 02109 617-725-0100
Website http://www.kittyoshea...

The 2nd floor can hold 200 people. There are 2 Bars upstairs, 4 huge comfy couches, AC, its own DJ area with light machine and dance floor, plus its own bathroom upstairs so we would truly have out own private party.

*$5 please* Biagio has a commitment from Kitty OSheas for 2 Bartenders at the upfront 2nd floor Bar and one Bartender in the back area 2nd floor Bar. Biagio is ordering $150-200 worth of appetizers (Wings/veggie platter, cheeses etc) because their Kitchen is small and we will never get enough food for 200 members. Biagio will ask if you eat any of the appetizers then he will need to ask people please to throw in $5 or so if they have some ( So if you do not have any its still voluntary and a free event).*$5 please*

Please join us for all this fun Friday June 13 after work starting at 6:30Pm till the cows come home.
Please note : After 9PM the bar charges a mandatory $10 cover just to get in so we need to make sure members come before 9PM.
After 9PM if we still have over 100 people upstairs we can keep the 2nd floor to ourselves all night.

The 4 Meetup Groups are:

  • New England 25+ Social Fun http://socialnetwork....
  • Beantown +Beyond 20-40 Something http://singles.meetup...
  • The Boston Happy Hour http://nightlife.meet...
  • The Metro Boston Active Singles 25-35 http://singles.meetup...


We had about 140 members at the last Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party plus there were over 30 members or so that begged us to come and we could not fit them in.

It should be fun and I hope you can all join us for this blast of a party!

PLEASE DO NOT DOUBLE TRIPLE OR QUADRUPLE RSVP
item.how_to_find_us: We will have the whole 2nd floor of Kitty OSheas to ourselves. I (Cara) will be milling around - my picture is accurate but I tend to get lost in the crowd so just ask for me :)
item.why: Cuz it will be an awesome off the hook a Meetup party for 200 members cross groups, we will have our own DJ, 2 Bars and 3 Bartender so the drinks will keep flowing!!
item.name: Boston Mix + Mingle Part 2 (M&M2)
